detail_desc: Fleece-lined jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Reversible sequin appliqué at the top, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved dress in cotton velvet with a round neck, buttons down the back, and seam with a skirt in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Lined at the top.

Shorts in stretch twill with detachable, adjustable braces, concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist, fly with a press-stud and flap patch pockets.
Hat in a soft knit with a pompom on top and appliqué on the turned-up edge.

Fitted, off-the-shoulder dress in ribbed jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a wide foldover edge at the top, long sleeves and a slit at the back. Concealed silicon trim at the top to hold the dress in place. Lined.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts. Jersey T-shirt with press-studs on one shoulder and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side pockets.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts. Jersey T-shirt with press-studs on one shoulder and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side pockets.
Hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Two metal pairs and one patterned plastic pair. Diameter from 3 cm to 4.5 cm.

Pyjamas with a top and bottoms in soft, patterned jersey. Top with a lace-trimmed V-neck, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with narrow elastication at the waist and hems.
Maxi dress in a pleated weave. Narrow cut at the top, an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined.

Set with a T-shirt and a pair of dungaree shorts in soft, organic cotton. T-shirt in soft slub jersey. Dungaree shorts with buttons at the sides, detachable elastic straps with a button, and flap leg pockets. Press-studs at the crotch (except in sizes 1-4Y).

Set with a T-shirt and a pair of dungaree shorts in soft, organic cotton. T-shirt in soft slub jersey. Dungaree shorts with buttons at the sides, detachable elastic straps with a button, and flap leg pockets. Press-studs at the crotch (except in sizes 1-4Y).

Jumpsuit in a crêpe weave in a narrow cut at the top with lace details. Lace and an open section at the back, and a hook and eye fastening at the back of the neck. Pleats at the top, a seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and wide legs. Unlined.

Set with a short-sleeved shirt and a pair of shorts in a cotton weave. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Shorts with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake pockets and a detachable, braided belt.

Calf-length satin dress with slits at the front, an opening down the back with a concealed button at the back of the neck and a concealed zip at the hem. Seam at the waist with decorative gathers, a detachable fabric belt and long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Partly lined.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
